DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety , pharmacokinetics , anti-tumor activity , identify tolerable dose AMG 228 subject advance solid tumor .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Study AMG 228 Treat Solid Tumors
DOC.criteria: Subject must pathologically document , definitively diagnose , advance solid tumor Adequate hematological , renal , hepatic , coagulation laboratory assessment Active autoimmune disease , history autoimmune disease Treatment immune modulators include Use warfarin , factor Xa inhibitor , direct thrombin inhibitor Antitumor therapy ( chemotherapy , antibody therapy , molecular target therapy , investigational agent ) within 28 day Major surgery within 28 day study day 1
